title: 82/247/EEC: Commission Decision of 31 March 1982 approving an amendment to the programme to promote the treatment, storage and marketing of quality cereals in Schleswig-Holstein pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 (Only the German text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 31 March 1982 approving an amendment to the programme to promote the treatment, storage and marketing of quality cereals in Schleswig-Holstein pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 (Only the German text is authentic) (82/247/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The amendment to the programme to promote the treatment, storage and marketing of quality cereals in Schleswig-Holstein, forwarded by the Government of the Federal Republic of Germany on 24 August 1981, is hereby approved.
This Decision is addressed to the Federal Republic of Germany.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 31 March 1982.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission  (1) OJ No L 51, 23.2.1977, p. 1.
